website_summaries.verdict: The great screen and camera make the Lumia 640 a brilliant phone for anyone on a budget who wants an alternative to Android -- so long as you aren't too bothered about apps.
pros: Both the screen and camera are among the best you'll find at this price, you can swap out the back panels for fresh colours, and the Windows Phone software is easy to use
cons: The front camera has a very poor resolution, the battery life is short, and the under-stocked app store won't please anyone wanting the latest apps and games

customer_reviews.title: lumia 640
customer_reviews.text: The phone was not unlocked as was stated on the website.. However, the unlock code was on the box without instructions on how to unlock the phone. The phone shutoff for no reason without you pressing any buttons...on a daily basis... It froze too and i had to reset within 2 days of using...as the power button was not responding... Overall it works great... The battery life is great... The ringer is low on max... Overall sound is loud
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel cheap yet it is affordable
customer_reviews.text: The best cheap phone. It is windows powered, but it looked cool and durable. I like the operating system, but Android and apple are way more convenient. Though windows look elegant because of the squary theme. I gave it as a gift. Camera was not bad. Sound, brightness, and battery were all good. Got decent horsepower and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Aldee

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, syncs with Windows , nice big icons.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, reasonably priced. I like the MS look, the big icons. Needed to tweak some settings for data usage, but no problem otherwise. The Windows 10 update made the preloaded navigator with her posh British accent go away. Other than that, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Horatius1967

customer_reviews.title: fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: very good phone for a budget minded customer. Now this is meant to be my back up phone but with excellent battery life decent camera and fast performance it has become my main phone atleast until the Lumia 950 is released this is priced below its value you point
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This phone comes as an AT&T GoPhone. However, it is unlocked, which means that it can be used with other providers such as T-Mobile (as long as you have a sim-card of that provider). In this regard you can fully ignore the fact that it is a AT&T GoPhone. The only downside is that it comes branded as AT&T, meaning that it is pre-loaded with AT&T apps, AT&T software and has the AT&T logo on the back cover. Other than that, it is an incredibly good price for a great Windows phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang H.

customer_reviews.title: Good seller, good phone
customer_reviews.text: Good seller, good phone. No problems, phone shipped quickly, policy question answered promptly before purchase by seller. Phone is a little slower than expected and has locked up couple of times, but still a crazy good value. My iPhone gets weird sometimes too and was 10x the price. Lumia's a four star. Five stars is for the seller.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Windows Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone at a great price. Forget I Phones and S6, I could buy 10 of these phones and still have money left over. The other thing about this phone that is better than the other phones - it's a windows phone,,a much better operating system. If you want a great phone and don't want to break the bank buy this.
customer_reviews.author: douglas martin

customer_reviews.title: Very good telephone. Convenient price. Pros & Cons
customer_reviews.text: Very good telephone. Convenient price. I used as my 2nd telephone Summary: Pros: + nice 4" screen same iphone 6 + good response speed in functions + Most of the needed apps available (watsap, skype, tunein, twitter, etc, ) + with w8.1 sync with icloud is transparent creating just the icloud email accout + Price. high hardware at low cost + same configuration screens as our Windows pc's (for a telephone) + Accept W10 Mobile + Good recepetion, speed, functions Cons: - With W10 not working sync with icloud anymore - some not common apps no available (i.e. Nut , cozmo) - vpn configuration block the telephone functions and not working (ppt, l2tp) -
customer_reviews.author: REN Venezuela

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! Works great! I downloaded windows 10 and it runs like a top, I was also able to transfer over to TracFone BYOP although it took 2 calls to do it! The first call the person on the other end whom I couldn't understand, wanted me to change different settings which didn't work, so I called back the next day and actually got a girl who spoke real english, she did everything herself remotely. It's setup perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: bvkw

customer_reviews.title: Phone Working Perfectly.  A+
customer_reviews.text: Phone was purchased to replace a failed 640. Packing was good and everything working as advertised. Was able to get onto the T-Mobile network without problem. Some have complained about the lack of LTE, but for my 72-year old mother-in-law, it is perfect for her needs. In fact, she is loving Cortana, hands free, and the maps app on Windows 10 Mobile. A+

My nephew was very disappointed when he opened and tried to install a Brazilian SIM card to find out it doesn't work there. Also: the cell phone itself was locked (it was sold as unlocked) , and both, box and cell were from the brand ZTE and not what I originally ordered: MICROSOFT NOKIA LUMIA 640 LTE RM-10728GB. The only one original Microsoft Nokia Lumia 640 item in the package was the label on top of the ZTE-label. To my fully disappointment, I also found the exact ZTE- cell phone for 59US$ at Amazon.com. Now, the cell phone is in Brazil and not working. I am very disappointed!

product_meta.title: Microsoft Nokia Lumia 640 LTE RM-1072 8GB 5" Unlocked GSM Windows 8MP Camera Smartphone - Black - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description: Power-infused performance Loaded with all the power you need, the Lumia 640 LTE works as fast and efficiently as you do. It's a workhorse that lets you concentrate more on what you're doing at any moment, with its quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 processor and Microsoft Office built in. And you'll have plenty of juice to help you achieve more with the whopping 2500 mAh battery. 2G GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900. 3G WCDMA 850 / 1900 / 2100. 4G LTE band 850/2100/1900 (1700/2100) mhz..
feature_bullets: 8 Megapixel Camera w/ Autofocus LED Flash / Front Facing Camera
5 inch IPS LCD Multi Touchscreen w/ ClearBlack display Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 3
Internal Memory: 8GB / 1GB RAM / microSD Slot Expandable up to 128GB (dedicated slot)
Microsoft Windows Phone 8.1 with Lumia Denim / Quad Core 1.2 GHz Cortex A7 Chipset Qualcomm MSM8926 Snapdragon 4

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars492 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
